string.value: Apparently, the place that makes the best Rice Wine in Korean Folk Town is Kong Ji's...

I went to Kong Ji's tavern because apparently her place was the best at making rice wine in Folk Town. She asked for 3 Three-Tailed Foxtails and 1,000 mesos in return for some rice wine.\n\n#t4000172# #b#c4000172##k/3
I gave Kong Ji 3 #t4000172#s and 1,000 mesos for 5 bottles of rice wine.
Long time no see~ have you made your way around town?\r\n#L0# #bCan I get some Rice Wine?#k

Rice Wine? Well, I have some leftover from my stepmom. My stepmom makes a very delicious Rice Wine, but I seriously cannot give them to you for free; she'll be very mad with me for that. She won't be mad, however, if you bring her something that she has been looking for.

My stepmom really likes foxtails, especially the ones of the Three-Tailed Fox. I heard it's very furry and warm, perfect for cold weather. If you can get me #b3 tails of the Three-Tailed Fox#k and #b1,000 mesos#k, I'll give you the rice wine, and I don't think my stepmom will be too angry with it.
Aren't you here because you needed Rice Wine?
Oh you really got it! So this is the tail of the Three-Tailed Fox. It's so soft and smooth. Thanks, and here's the rice wine. I'm sure my stepmom will love this.
If you need more rice wine down the road, please come see me~! Just know that I can only make it #bonce#k a day...
Bring me 3 tails of Three-Tailed Fox and I'll give you some Rice Wine.
